definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
to pull/to tear/(of cloth, thread etc) to buy/to chat/to gossip/(coll.) (Tw) ridiculous/hokey

sentences.english: To be or not to be, I used to think that it was bullshit.
sentences.chinese: 活呀還是死呀，過去我覺得這話就是胡扯。

sentences.english: ' It's the financial equivalent of 'half pregnant'-pure nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 這就像“相對懷孕”一樣完全是胡扯。

sentences.english: Dave the Waffling Hamster gives you your own fun hamster on your phone.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫的胡扯倉鼠給你在手機上自己的樂趣倉鼠。

sentences.english: "Nuts, " he replied the officer. "Who are you?"
Your correspondent thinks this is poppycock.
sentences.chinese: 本刊記者認爲這純粹是胡扯。

sentences.english: The silly young man was prating about a subject of which he knew nothing.
sentences.chinese: 那個傻里傻氣的年輕人在胡扯他一無所知的問題。

sentences.english: What's the young man driveling about?
sentences.chinese: 那個年輕人在胡扯什麼？

sentences.english: One of several such gatherings before, Hu eat "Ongoing nonsense true."
sentences.chinese: 一如此前的幾次聚會，胡喫海塞胡扯瞎掰。

sentences.english: But everybody knows the movies are full of shit.
sentences.chinese: 但大家都知道那種電影全都是胡扯。

sentences.english: There are rumblings that Sepp opposed the Qatar bid.
sentences.chinese: 還有過流言說胡扯曾經反對過卡塔爾申辦。

sentences.english: The girls were still gassing when I left.
sentences.chinese: 我走的時候，那些女孩子們還在胡扯。

sentences.english: She was drivelling on about her friends at school.
sentences.chinese: 她在沒完沒了地胡扯她在學校裏的朋友們。

sentences.english: You’ll write a lot, and most of it will be bullshit.
sentences.chinese: 你可能會寫很多的文章，但大部分作品都是胡扯。

sentences.english: Let us cut the baloney on this subject.
sentences.chinese: 關於這個問題我們就別胡扯了。

sentences.english: He often horseshits to her for his love.
sentences.chinese: 那時他常向她表白愛情，其實那些話全是胡扯。

definition: to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to talk drivel/to assert sth without a proper understanding or basis in fact/not to know what one is talking about
to talk random nonsense (idiom); to say whatever comes into one's head
to boast/to shoot one's mouth off
to make things up/to concoct (a story, an excuse etc)
to speak without thinking/to blurt sth out
